Source.Name: cakephp
Source.Description: CakePHP enables PHP users at all levels to rapidly develop robust web applications.

Update.Comment: Version bump. Some changes in this release: * Add resolution of symbolic links in cake CLI bash script. Removing newlines from end of file * Interpret symlinks correctly * Set umask when creating cache file * Add Opera mobi to mobile browser list * Fix issues with using 0 as an option for a shell command * Add support for NULL values in Set::format() * Update the doc block for Datasource::delete() * Fix precision issues where numbers would get truncated * Re-add DISABLE_DEFAULT_ERROR_HANDLING to Configure * Fix Model.field.1 style fields when used with SecurityComponent * Fix Validation::time so it accepts spaces * Additional inflection rules provided through Inflector::rules() now take precedence over the core ones as expected
Update.Name: Gökhan Özbulak

Update.Comment: Version bump. Some changes in this release: * Fix incorrect formation of query string removed on ALTER COLUMN xx TYPE xxx for postgres * Removing AFTER in Postgres add column. It causes SQL errors on Postgres 8.4 * Fix SQL when using operator SIMILAR TO * Updating doc comment about find(list) * Fix bug where scientific notations were not passed to mysql in their original form which resulted in loss of precision * Fix issue with boolean columns not correctly inserting data in MySQL * Add missing import in EmailComponent * Fix Accept header parsing so content types with leading/trailing spaces are treated as spaceless * Prepare utf8 database connection option * Add better file locking in write() for better file locking and unserialization * Change Postgresql to use DELETE FROM instead of TRUNCATE
Update.Name: Gökhan Özbulak

Update.Comment: * Fix access problem to tmp dir for caching and logging (pb#17538) * Version bump including changes: - Fixtures are now truncated in reverse order, this can help some applications with constraints in database to run tests more smoothly - Database credentials will now be hidden from debug output to protect users that forgot to set debug = 0 in their production servers - Bug fix for detecting correct setup for mod_rewrite - Datasource will now return false instead of raising an error if unable to connect to Mysql or Mysqli - Added a banner to the default home.ctp to show important CakePHP announcements
Update.Name: Gökhan Özbulak
